DOC.brief_summary: Retinopathy prematurity ( ROP ) one major morbidity among preterm infant . Although , local anesthetic reduce pain extent , eye examination still remain painful procedure . The investigator aim evaluate effect oral paracetamol combine local anesthetic pain relief ophthalmological examination .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Paracetamol Reducing Pain During Ophthalmological Examination Retinopathy Prematurity : Prospective Randomised Trial
DOC.criteria: gestational age 32 week birth weight 1500 gram congenital anomaly , necrotising enterocolitis , surgical problem
